name: Save the World, by Agnesie Games
name_original: Save the World, by Agnesie Games
description: It's the year 2030 and the world is completely devastated by the greenhouse effect. People weren't taking care of the Planet and now we must face the consequences. Now all humans must learn how to save the Planet before it is too late!! In this game, you are going to learn 3 of the world-saving skills and collect 3 keys to open the magic chest at the end. You will be given a brand new world to replace the dilapidated world, BUT be careful, this is the only time you will get a second chance, humans must be careful and protect this world, or else all of humanity will perish!!!
